snippet.title: Ruins of Tearyn: Smallest MMO
snippet.description:
Ruins of Tearyn is the smallest fantasy MMO inspired by classic MMORPGs (but modernized!). There will be formidable warriors, epic healers, try-hard DPS and mesmerizing enchanters.

Ruins of Tearyn is being developed by Fabled Karma Studios - aka. Christen Main (@gameDEVbeauty) and Christopher Main (@TheMainStark). Both of which have nearly a decade working in Unreal Engine, received $100,000 in Epic MegaGrants for Vertical Third, and key authors for the Epic Games Game Design Professional Certificate on Coursera (Courses 5 - 8).

Vertical Third is a massive multiplayer-ready gameplay architecture available on Fab.com. A free tech demo can be downloaded on the Epic Games Store and had a feature on the official Unreal Engine Livestream, Inside Unreal.

Discord:
https://discord.gg/tWUJKfuK3q

Ko-FI: 
https://ko-fi.com/ruinsoftearyn

gameDEVbeauty:
https://www.youtube.com/@gamedevbeauty
https://www.twitch.tv/gameDEVbeauty

TheMainStark:
https://www.youtube.com/@TheMainStark
https://www.twitch.tv/themainstark

Vertical Third:
Website: https://verticalthird.com/
Tech Demo: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/vertical-third-tech-demo-ccfff7
Fab: https://fab.com/s/21caa84ceb36
Inside Unreal 3-Hour Feature: https://www.youtube.com/live/X4VwkcM8qEY?si=ZojR0u5-NWw5QQUN

Coursera:
https://www.coursera.org/professional-certificates/epic-games-game-design-professional-certificate
Note: We do not receive any financial compensation for anything related to this course or Coursera.

UEFN Boba Shop - Unreal Editor 3D Modeling:
https://dev.epicgames.com/community/learning/tutorials/WWbK/fortnite-uefn-boba-shop

00:00 INTRODUCTION
00:32 WHAT
01:42 WHO
02:47 WHY
03:32 HOW
04:42 ENDING
